desc: Backed by over 50 years experience selecting the most beautiful hand-made rugs woven in the major carpet-weaving countries of the middle-east. The breath-taking variety of colours and designs make our rugs the perfect finishing touch to your home – suited to any furnishing style; traditional or contemporary.

layout.text: Backed by over 50 years experience selecting the most beautiful hand-made rugs woven in the major carpet-weaving countries of the middle-east.
